column2: Date & Name of Solemnity (S) or Feast (f)
column8:
Years It Falls
 on a Sunday

column2: Feb. 2: The Presentation of the Lord

March 25: The Annunciation of the Lord
 (tranferred if 3/25 is a Sunday, or if it falls during
 Holy Week or Easter Week - see the table below)
June [23]/24: The Nativity of St. John the Baptist: Vigil

June 24: The Nativity of St. John the Baptist: Day
 (exceptions for 2022, 2033, and 2044: transferred to Thursday 6/23, 
 since Friday 6/24 is the Solemnity of the Sacred Heart of Jesus)
June [28]/29: SS. Peter and Paul, Apostles: Vigil
June 29: SS. Peter and Paul, Apostles: Day
Aug 6: The Transfiguration of the Lord
column7:
A: Matt 17:1-9 
 B: Mark 9:2-10 
 C: Luke 9:28b-36

column2: Aug. [14]/15: The Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary: Vigil
Aug. 15: The Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary: Day
Sept. 14: The Exaltation of the Cross

Nov 2: The Commemoration of All the Faithful Departed (All Souls) - 
 [new on the list of feasts with special readings; previously
 any readings for Masses for the Dead were recommended]

Nov 9: The Dedication of the Lateran Basilica 
 [new on the list of feasts with special readings]

Dec. 8: The Immaculate Conception of the Blessed Virgin Mary 
 (transferred to Monday 12/9 if 12/8 is a Sunday of Advent )
